name: I Can See the Future
description: This is my job. Dying again and again. But I'm used to it. That's how I can see the future. What's waiting for me? Good question.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2x 2GHz with SSE2 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: SM3.0 GPU with 768MB memory, mobile/integrated GPUs might not work! DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2x 3GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia Geforce GTX 470 or AMD Radeon HD 4850 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
